snippet: A sweeping 600-page report by a bipartisan, independent group held top American officials responsible for the torture of detainees after the Sept. 11, 2001, terrorist attacks.
lead_paragraph: A sweeping 600-page report by a bipartisan, independent group held top American officials responsible for the torture of detainees after the Sept. 11, 2001, terrorist attacks.

headline.main: Constitution Project’s Report on Detainee Treatment
